001package edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.viewmodel;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import android.util.Log;
005import androidx.lifecycle.DefaultLifecycleObserver;
006import androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner;
007import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
008import androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData;
009import androidx.lifecycle.Transformations;
010import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel;
011import dagger.hilt.android.lifecycle.HiltViewModel;
012import dagger.hilt.android.qualifiers.ApplicationContext;
013import edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.model.entity.Preset;
014import edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.service.PresetRepository;
015import edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.service.SwarmatronRepository;
016import io.reactivex.rxjava3.disposables.CompositeDisposable;
017import java.util.List;
018import javax.inject.Inject;
019@HiltViewModel
020public class PresetViewModel extends ViewModel implements DefaultLifecycleObserver {
021
022  private final SwarmatronRepository swarmRepository;
023  private final PresetRepository repository;
024  private final MutableLiveData<Long> presetId;
025  private final LiveData<Preset> preset;
026  private final MutableLiveData<Throwable> throwable;
027  private final CompositeDisposable pending;
028
029
030  @Inject
031  PresetViewModel(@ApplicationContext Context context, PresetRepository repository,
032      SwarmatronRepository swarmRepository) {
033    this.swarmRepository = swarmRepository;
034    this.repository = repository;
035    presetId = new MutableLiveData<>();
036    preset = Transformations.switchMap(presetId, repository::get);
037    throwable = new MutableLiveData<>();
038    pending = new CompositeDisposable();
039
040  }
041
042  public Preset save(Preset preset) {
043
044    repository.save(preset)
045        .subscribe(
046            presetId::postValue,
047            this::postThrowable,
048            pending
049
050        );
051    return preset;
052  }
053
054  public void load(Preset preset) {
055    swarmRepository.loadSwarm(preset);
056  }
057
058  public LiveData<List<Preset>> getAllPresets() {
059    return repository.getAll();
060  }
061
062  public LiveData<Long> getPresetId() {
063    return presetId;
064  }
065
066  public LiveData<Preset> getPresetByName(String presetname) {
067    return repository.getByName(presetname);
068  }
069
070  public LiveData<Preset> getPreset() {
071    return preset;
072  }
073
074  public MutableLiveData<Throwable> getThrowable() {
075    return throwable;
076  }
077
078  private void postThrowable(Throwable throwable) {
079    Log.e(getClass().getSimpleName(), throwable.getMessage(), throwable);
080    this.throwable.postValue(throwable);
081  }
082
083  public LiveData<Preset> findPreset(long id) {
084    return repository.get(id);
085  }
086
087  public void fetch(long presetId) {
088    this.presetId.postValue(presetId);
089  }
090
091  public void delete(Preset preset) {
092    repository.delete(preset)
093        .subscribe(
094            () -> {},
095            this::postThrowable,
096            pending
097        );
098
099  }
100}
